actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that individuals who were eligible for disability benefits immediately prior to becoming eligible for old-age benefits shall continue to be eligible for certain rehabilitation vehicles and devices.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that individuals who were eligible for disability benefits immediately prior to becoming eligible for old-age benefits shall continue to be eligible for vehicles and devices in connection with vocational rehabilitation services as provided in the Vocational Rehabilitation Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that individuals who were eligible for disability benefits immediately prior to becoming eligible for old-age benefits shall continue to be eligible for certain rehabilitation vehicles and devices.
